title: Dionysii Halicarnasei Quae Exstant, Volumen Quintum
Opsuculorum, Volumen Prius
monogr.author: Dionysius of Halicarnassus

p.#text:
pollw=n met' a)/llwn ce/nwn te kai\ parado/cwn a)kousma/twn,
w)=n e)nh/noxen o( kaq' h(ma=s xro/nos, e(/n ti kai\
tou=to e)fa/nh moi prw/tws a)kou/santi para\ sou=, o(/ti tw=n 
filoso/fwn tis tw=n e)k tou= peripa/tou pa/nta xari/zesqai
boulo/menos *)aristote/lei tw=| kti/santi tau/thn th\n filosofi/an
kai\ tou=to u(pe/sxeto poih/sein fanero/n, o(/ti *dhmosqe/nhs
ta\s r(htorika\s te/xnas par' e)kei/nou maqw\n
ei)s tou\s i)di/ous meth/negke lo/gous kai\ kat' e)kei=na kosmou/menos 
ta\ paragge/lmata pa/ntwn e)ge/neto tw=n r(hto/rwn
kra/tistos. kat' a)rxa\s me\n ou)=n u(pela/mbanon
tw=n pollw=n tina ei)=nai to\n tau=t' e)pixeirh/santa le/gein,
kai\ parh/|noun soi mh\ pa=si toi=s parado/cois prose/xein.
w(s de\ kai\ tou)/noma tou= a)ndro\s e)puqo/mhn, o(\n e)gw\ kai\ 
tw=n h)qw=n e(/neka kai\ tw=n lo/gwn a)pode/xomai, e)qau/masa,
kai\ polu\s e)n e)mautw=| geno/menos e)pimeleste/ras w)/|mhn
dei=sqai ske/yews to\ pra=gma, mh/ pote le/lhqe/ me ta)lhqe\s
ou(/tws e)/xon kai\ ou)de\n ei)kh=| tw=| a)ndri\ ei)/rhtai,

i(/na  h)\ th\n do/can h(\n pro/teron au)to\s e)/sxon  
bebai/ws maqw\n o(/ti proterou=si tw=n *dhmosqe/nous lo/gwn
ai( *)aristote/lous te/xnai, h)\ to\n ou(/tws e)gnwko/ta
kai\ gra/yai ge pareskeuasme/non, pri\n ei)s o)/xlon e)kdou=nai
to\ su/ntagma, metabalei=n pei/saimi th\n do/can.

ou)k e)laxi/sthn de/ moi kai\ su\ pare/sxou r(oph\n ei)s
to\ mh\ pare/rgws e)ceta/sai th\n a)lh/qeian, parakalw=n
fanerou\s poih=sai tou\s lo/gous, oi(=s e)mauto\n pe/peika
*dhmosqe/nous a)kma/zontos h)/dh kai\ tou\s e)pifanesta/tous
ei)rhko/tos a)gw=nas to/te u(po\ *aristote/lous ta\s r(htorika\s
gegra/fqai te/xnas. e)do/keis te/ moi kai\ tou=to o)rqw=s
parainei=n, mh\ shmei/ois mhde\ ei)ko/si mhd' a)llotri/ais 
to\ pra=gma pistw/sasqai marturi/ais, e)peidh\ tou/twn
ou)demi/a: tw=n pi/stewn di' a)nagkai/wn suna/getai
lhmma/twn: a)ll' au)to\n *)aristote/lh parasxe/sqai dia\
tw=n i)di/wn texnw=n o(mologou=nta ta)lhqe\s ou(/tws e)/xein.
tou=to dh\ pepoi/hka, be/ltiste *)ammai=e, th=s te a)lhqei/as
pronoou/menos, h(\n e)pi\ panto\s oi)/omai dei=n pra/gmatos
e)ceta/zesqai, kai\ th=s a(pa/ntwn tw=n peri\ tou\s politikou\s
lo/gous e)spoudako/twn xa/ritos: i(/na mh\ tou=q' u(pola/bwsin,
o(/ti pa/nta periei/lhfen h( peripathtikh\ filosofi/a

ta\ r(htorika\ paragge/lmata, kai\ ou)/te oi( peri\
*qeo/dwron kai\ *qrasu/maxon kai\ *)antifw=nta spoudh=s
a)/cion ou)de\n eu(=ron ou)/te *)isokra/ths kai\ *)anacime/nhs kai\
*alkida/mas ou)/te oi( tou/tois sumbiw/santes toi=s a)ndra/si
paraggelma/twn texnikw=n suggrafei=s kai\ a)gwnistai\ 
lo/gwn r(htorikw=n, oi( peri\ *qeode/kthn kai\ *fili/skon kai\
*)isai=on kai\ *khfiso/dwron *(uperei/dhn te kai\ *lukou=rgon
kai\ *ai)sxi/nhn, ou)d'  au)to\s o( *dhmosqe/nhs o(
pa/ntas u(perbalo/menos tou/s te pro\ au(tou= kai\ tou\s
kaq' e(auto\n kai\ mhde\ toi=s ginome/nois u(perbolh\n katalipw\n 
tosou=tos e)ge/neto toi=s *)isokra/tous te kai\ *)isai/ou
kosmou/menos paragge/lmasin, ei) mh\ ta\s *)aristote/lous
te/xnas e)ce/maqen.

w)= fi/le *)ammai=e, ou)d' 
e)k tw=n *)aristote/lous texnw=n tw=n u(/steron e)cenexqeisw=n 
oi( *dhmosqe/nous lo/goi suneta/xqhsan a)lla\ kaq' e(te/ras
tina\s ei)sagwga/s: u(pe\r w(=n e)n i)di/a| dhlw/sw grafh=| ta\
dokou=nta/ moi: polu\s ga\r o( peri\ au)tw=n lo/gos, o(\n ou)
kalw=s ei)=xen e(te/ras grafh=s poih=sai pa/rergon. e)n de\
tw=| paro/nti tou=to peira/somai fanero\n poih=sai, o(/ti 
*dhmosqe/nous a)kma/zontos h)/dh kata\ th\n politei/an kai\
tou\s e)pifanesta/tous ei)rhko/tos a)gw=nas tou/s te dikanikou\s
kai\ tou\s dhmhgorikou\s kai\ qaumazome/nou dia\
pa/shs th=s *(ella/dos e)pi\ deino/thti lo/gwn to/te o( filo/sofos

ta\s r(htorika\s e)/graye te/xnas. a)na/gkh d' i)/sws
prw=ton, w(s  pare/labon e)k tw=n koinw=n i(storiw=n, a(\ 
kate/lipon h(mi=n oi( tou\s bi/ous tw=n a)ndrw=n suntaca/menoi,
proeipei=n. poih/somai de\ a)po\ *dhmosqe/nous th\n
a)rxh/n.

quote:
e)pi\ pollw=n me\n i)dei=n a)/n tis w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi/
moi dokei=
a)nti\ pollw=n a)\n w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi xrhma/twn
p.#text:
ou(=tos e)gennh/qh me\n e)niautw=| pro/teron th=s e(katosth=s
*)olumpia/dos: a)/rxontos de\ *timokra/tous. ei)s e)/tos
h)=n e)mbebhkw\s e(ptakaide/katon dhmosi/ous de\ lo/gous
h)/rcato gra/fein e)pi\ *kallistra/tou a)/rxontos ei)kosto\n
kai\ pe/mpton e)/tos e)/xwn. kai\ e)/stin au)tou= prw=tos tw=n
e)n dikasthri/w| kataskeuasqe/ntwn a)gw/nwn o( kata\ *)androti/wnos,
o(\n e)/grafe *diodw/rw| tw=| kri/nonti to\ yh/fisma
parano/mwn, kai\ kata\ to\n au)to\n xro/non e(/teros
, o( peri\ tw=n a)teleiw=n,
o(\n au)to\s die/qeto, xarie/statos a(pa/ntwn tw=n lo/gwn kai\
grafikw/tatos. e)pi\ de\ *dioti/mou tou= meta\ *kalli/straton
e)n *)aqhnai/ois prw/thn ei)=pe dhmhgori/an, h(\n e)pigra/fousin
oi(  tou\s r(htorikou\s pi/nakas sunta/cantes 
: e)n h(=| pareka/lei tou\s *)aqhnai/ous
mh\ lu/ein th\n pro\s basile/a genome/nhn ei)rh/nhn mhde\
prote/rous a)/rxein tou= pole/mou, e)a\n mh\ paraskeua/swntai
th\n nautikh\n du/namin, e)n h(=| plei/sthn ei)=xon i)sxu/n,
kai\ to\n tro/pon th=s paraskeuh=s au)to\s u(poti/qetai. e)pi\
de\ *qoudh/mou tou= meta\ *dio/timon a)/rcantos to/n te kata\

*timokra/tous lo/gon e)/graye *diodw/rw| tw=| kri/nonti parano/mwn
to\n *timokra/th kai\ to\n peri\ th=s *megalopolitw=n
bohqei/as dhmhgoriko\n au)to\s a)ph/ggeile. meta\ de\
*qou/dhmon e)/stin *)aristo/dhmos a)/rxwn, e)f' ou(= tw=n kata\
*fili/ppou dhmhgoriw=n h)/rcato, kai\ lo/gon e)n tw=| dh/mw| 
die/qeto peri\ th=s a)postolh=s tou= cenikou= strateu/matos
kai\ tw=n de/ka fugadikw=n trihrw=n ei)s *makedoni/an. e)n
tou/tw| tw=| xro/nw| kai\ to\n kata\ *)aristokra/tous e)/graye
lo/gon *eu)quklei= tw=| diw/konti parano/mwn to\ yh/fisma.
e)pi\ de\ *qee/llou tou= meta\ *)aristo/dhmon th\n peri\ *(rodi/wn 
a)ph/ggeile dhmhgori/an, e)n h(=| pei/qei tou=s *)aqhnai/ous
katalu=sai th\n o)ligarxi/an au)tw=n kai\ to\n dh=mon
e)leuqerw=sai. e)pi\ de\ *kallima/xou tou= tri/tou meta\
*qe/ellon a)/rcantos trei=s die/qeto dhmhgori/as parakalw=n
*)aqhnai/ous boh/qeian *)olunqi/ois a)postei=lai toi=s 
polemoume/nois u(po\ *fili/ppou, prw/thn me\n h(=s e)stin
a)rxh\ : deute/ran de\ *(ou)xi\ tau)ta\ pari/statai/
moi gignw/skein w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi): tri/thn de\
. 
kata\ tou=ton ge/graptai to\n a)/rxonta kai\ o( kata\ *meidi/ou

lo/gos, o(\n suneta/cato meta\  th\n xeirotoni/an, h(\n 
o( dh=mos au)ta=| katexeiroto/nhse. me/xri tou=d' eu(riskome/nwn
dw/deka lo/gwn, w(=n ei)/rhka, dhmosi/wn, e)n oi(=s ei)si
dhmhgorikoi\ me\n e(pta/, dikanikoi\ de\ pe/nte, a(/pantes
 pro/teroi tw=n *)aristote/lous texnw=n, w(s e)/k
te tw=n i(storoume/nwn peri\ tou= a)ndro\s a)podei/cw kai\
e)k tw=n u(p' au)tou= grafe/ntwn, e)nteu=qen a)rca/menos.

*)aristote/lhs patro\s me\n h)=n *nikoma/xou to\ ge/nos
kai\ th\n te/xnhn a)nafe/rontos ei)s *maxa/ona to\n *)asklhpiou=,
mhtro\s de\ *faisti/dos a)pogo/nou tino\s tw=n e)k
*xalki/dos th\n a)poiki/an a)gago/ntwn ei)s *sta/geira: e)gennh/qh
de\ kata\ th\n e)nenhkosth\n kai\ e)na/thn *)olumpia/da
*diotrefou=s *)aqh/nhsin a)/rxontos trisi\n e)/tesi *dhmosqe/nous
 presbu/teros. e)pi\ de\ *poluzh/lou a)/rxontos 
teleuth/santos tou= patro\s o)ktwkaide/katon e)/tos e)/xwn
ei)s *)aqh/nas h)=lqen, kai\ sustaqei\s *pla/twni xro/non
ei)kosaeth= die/triye su\n au)tw=|. a)poqano/ntos de\ *pla/twnos
e)pi\ *qeofi/lou a)/rxontos a)ph=re pro\s *(ermi/an to\n

*)atarne/ws tu/rannon kai\ trieth= xro/non par' au)tw=| diatri/yas
e)p' *eu)bou/lou a)/rxontos ei)s *mutilh/nhn e)xwri/sqh:
e)kei=qen de\ pro\s *fi/lippon w)/|xeto kata\ *puqo/doton
a)/rxonta, kai\ die/triye xro/non o)ktaeth= par' au)tw=| kaqhgou/menos
*)aleca/ndrou: meta\ de\ th\n *fili/ppou teleuth\n 
e)p' *eu)aine/tou a)/rxontos a)fiko/menos ei)s *)aqh/nas
e)sxo/lazen e)n *lukei/w| xro/non e)tw=n dw/deka. tw=| de\ triskaideka/tw|,
meta\ th\n *)aleca/ndrou teleuth\n e)pi\ *khfisodw/rou
a)/rxontos a)pa/ras ei)s *xalki/da no/sw| teleuta=|,
tri/a pro\s toi=s e(ch/konta biw/sas e)/th.

quote.#text:
xrh/simos d' e)sti\n h( r(htorikh\

dia/ ge to\ fu/sei ei)=nai krei/ttw ta)lhqh= kai\ ta\ di/kaia
tw=n e)nanti/wn: w(/ste e)a\n mh\ kata\ to\ prosh=kon ai( kri/seis
gi/nwntai, a)na/gkh di' au(to\n h(tta=sqai: tou=to d'
e)sti\n a)/cion e)pitimh/sews. e)/ti de\ pro\s e)ni/ous, ou)d' ei)
th\n a)kribesta/thn e)/xoimen e)pisth/mhn, r(a/|dion a)p' e)kei/nhs 
pei=sai le/gontas: didaskali/a ga/r e)stin o( kata\ th\n
e)pisth/mhn lo/gos, tou=to de\ a)du/naton: a)ll' a)na/gkh dia\
tw=n koinw=n poiei=sqai ta\s pi/steis kai\ tou\s lo/gous,
w(/sper kai\ e)n toi=s topikoi=s le/gomen peri\ th=s pro\s tou\s pollou\s e)nteu/cews.

p.#text:
tau=ta me\n ou)=n e)/stin a(\ paradedw/kasin h(mi=n oi( to\n 
bi/on tou= a)ndro\s a)nagra/yantes. a(\ de\ au)to\s o( filo/sofos
u(pe\r e(autou= gra/fei, pa=san a)fairou/menos e)pixei/rhsin
tw=n xari/zesqai boulome/nwn au)tw=| ta\ mh\ prosh/konta,
pro\s polloi=s  a)/llois w(=n ou)de\n de/omai memnh=sqai 
kata\ to\ paro/n, a(\ te/qhken e)n th=| prw/th| bu/blw|
tau/ths th=s pragmatei/as, w(s ou) meira/kion h)=n, o(/te ta\s
r(htorika\s suneta/tteto te/xnas, a)ll' e)n th=| krati/sth|
gegonw\s a)kmh=| kai\ proekdedwkw\s h)/dh ta/s te topika\s
sunta/ceis kai\ ta\s a)nalutika\s kai\ ta\s meqodika/s, tekmh/ri) 
e)sti\n i)sxuro/tata. a)rca/menos ga\r ta\s w)felei/as
e)pideiknu/ein, a(\s periei/lhfen o( r(htoriko\s lo/gos, tau=ta
kata\ le/cin gra/fei:

quote.#text:
tw=n de\ dia\ tou= dei/knusqai  fai/nesqai
dei/knusqai, kaqa/per kai\ e)n toi=s a)nalutikoi=s to\ me\n
e)pagwgh/ e)sti, to\ de\ sullogismo/s,  , kai\ e)ntau=q' o(moi/ws: e)/sti ga\r to\ me\n
para/deigma e)pagwgh/, to\ d' e)nqu/mhma sullogismo/s, to\

de\ faino/menon faino/menos sullogismo/s: kalw= ga\r e)nqu/mhma
me\n r(htoriko\n sullogismo/n, para/deigma de\
e)pagwgh\n r(htorikh/n: pa/ntes de\ ta\s pi/steis poiou=ntai
dia\ tou= deiknu/nai o(tiou=n, dh=lon d' h(mi=n tou=to
e)k tw=n a)nalutikw=n, a)nagkai=on e(ka/teron  
tou/twn to\ au)to\ ei)=nai. ti/s d' e)sti\ diafora\ paradei/gmatos
kai\ e)nqumh/matos, fanero\n e)k tw=n topikw=n:
e)kei= ga\r peri\ sullogismou= kai\ e)pagwgh=s ei)/rhtai pro/teron,
o(/ti to\ me\n e)pi\ pollw=n kai\ o(moi/wn dei/knusqai
o(/ti ou(/tws e)/xei e)kei= me\n e)pagwgh/ e)stin, e)ntau=qa de\ 
para/deigma: to\ de\ tinw=n o)/ntwn e(/tero/n  ti dia\ tau=ta
sumbai/nein para\ to\ tau=t' ei)=nai h)\ kaqo/lou h)\ w(s e)pi\
to\ polu/, e)kei= me\n sullogismo/s, e)ntau=qa de\ e)nqu/mhma
kalei=tai. fanero\n de\ kai\ o(/ti e(ka/teron e)/xei a)gaqo\n
to\ ei)=dos th=s r(htorei/as: kaqa/per  kai\ e)n toi=s meqodikoi=s 
ei)/rhtai, kai\ e)n tou/tois o(moi/ws e)/xei.

p.#text:
peri\ de\ paradeigma/twn 
 proelo/menos le/gein, o(/ti th\n au)th\n tau=t'
e)/xei du/namin tai=s e)pagwgai=s kai\ toi=s sullogismoi=s,
tau=ta peri\ th=s a)nalutikh=s kai\ meqodikh=s pragmatei/as
ti/qhsi:  o(/sa
me\n ou)=n *)aristote/lhs u(pe\r e(autou= ge/grafe marturo/menos
diarrh/dhn, o(/ti ta\s r(htorika\s te/xnas suneta/cato
presbu/teros w)\n h)/dh kai\ ta\s krati/stas sunta/ceis proekdedwkw/s,

tau=t' e)sti/n: e)c w(=n o(\ proeilo/mhn poih=sai
fanero/n, o(/ti proterou=sin oi( tou= r(h/toros a)gw=nes tw=n
tou= filoso/fou texnw=n, i(kanw=s a)podedei=xqai nomi/zw:
ei)/ ge o(\ me\n ei)kosto\n kai\ pe/mpton e)/tos e)/xwn h)/rcato
politeu/esqai kai\ dhmhgorei=n kai\ lo/gous ei)s dikasth/ria
gra/fein, o(\ de\ kata\ tou\s au)tou\s xro/nous e)/ti 
sunh=n *pla/twni kai\ die/triyen e(/ws e)tw=n e(pta\ kai\ tria/konta 
ou)/te sxolh=s h(gou/menos ou)/te i)di/an pepoihkw\s ai(/resin.

quote.#text:
tw=n de\ metaforw=n tetta/rwn ou)sw=n, eu)dokimou=si ma/lista

ai( kata\ a)nalogi/an: w(s *periklh=s e)/fh th\n neo/thta
th\n a)polome/nhn e)n tw=| pole/mw| ou(/tws  h)fani/sqai
e)k th=s po/lews, w(/sper ei)/ tis to\ e)/ar e)k tou= e)niautou=
e)ce/loi  kai\ *khfiso/dotos spouda/zontos *xa/rhtos eu)qu/nas
dou=nai tw=n peri\ to\n *)olunqiako\n po/lemon h)gana/ktei 
fa/skwn au)to\n ei)s pni=gma to\n dh=mon a)gago/nta
ta\s eu)qu/nas peira=sqai dido/nai.

p.#text:
ei) de/ tis ou(/tws e)/stai du/seris w(/ste kai\ pro\s tau=ta
 a)ntile/gein, o(/ti me\n u(/steron e)gra/fhsan ai( r(htorikai\
te/xnai tw=n a)nalutikw=n te kai\ meqodikw=n kai\ topikw=n,
o(mologw=n a)lhqe\s ei)=nai, ou)de\n de\ kwlu/ein le/gwn a(pa/sas
tau/tas kateskeuake/nai to\n filo/sofon ta\s pragmatei/as
e)/ti paideuo/menon para\ *pla/twni, yuxra\n me\n
kai\ a)pi/qanon e)pixei/rhsin ei)sa/gwn, biazo/menos de\ to\
kakourgo/taton tw=n e)pixeirhma/twn poiei=n piqanw/teron,
o(/ti kai\ to\ mh\ ei)ko\s gi/netai/ pote ei)ko/s, a)fei\s a(\ pro\s
tau=ta le/gein ei)=xon e)pi\ ta\s au)tou= tre/yomai tou= filoso/fou
marturi/as, a(\s e)n th=| tri/th| bu/blw| tw=n texnw=n
te/qhke peri\ th=s metafora=s kata\ le/cin ou(/tw gra/fwn:

quote.#text:
*kalli/maxos *pergash=qen:
e)pi\ tou/tou *)olunqi/ois polemoume/nois u(po\ *fili/ppou
kai\ pre/sbeis *)aqh/naze pe/myasin oi( *)aqhnai=oi
summaxi/an te e)poih/santo kai\ boh/qeian e)/pemyan 
peltasta\s disxili/ous, trih/reis de\ tria/konta ta\s  meta\
*xa/rhtos kai\ a(\s suneplh/rwsan o)ktw/.

peri\ de\ to\n

au)to\n xro/non *xalkide/wn tw=n e)pi\ *qra/|khs qlibome/nwn
tw=| pole/mw| kai\ presbeusame/nwn *)aqh/naze *xari/dhmon
au)toi=s e)/pemyan oi( *)aqhnai=oi to\n e)n *(ellhspo/ntw| strathgo/n:
o(\s e)/xwn o)ktwkai/deka trih/reis kai\ peltasta\s
tetrakisxili/ous, i(ppei=s de\ penth/konta kai\ e(kato\n h)=lqen
ei)s th/n te *pallh/nhn kai\ th\n *bottiai/an met' *)olunqi/wn
kai\ th\n xw/ran e)po/rqhsen.

pa/lin de\ tw=n *)olunqi/wn pre/sbeis
a)posteila/ntwn ei)s ta\s *)aqh/nas kai\ deome/nwn mh\
periidei=n au)tou\s katapolemhqe/ntas, a)lla\ pro\s tai=s
u(parxou/sais duna/mesi pe/myai boh/qeian mh\ cenikh\n
a)ll' au)tw=n *)aqhnai/wn, e)/pemyen au)toi=s o( dh=mos trih/reis
me\n e(te/ras e(ptakai/deka  tw=n politw=n o(pli/tas
disxili/ous kai\ i(ppei=s triakosi/ous e)n nausi\n i(pphgoi=s,
strathgo\n de\ *xa/rhta tou= sto/lou panto/s.

p.#text:
ou(twsi\ me\n dh\ safw=s au)to\s o( filo/sofos a)podeiknu/ei 
meta\ to\n *)olunqiako\n po/lemon gegramme/nas
u(p' au)tou= ta\s te/xnas. ou(=tos d' e)pi\ *kallima/xou ge/gonen 
a)/rxontos, w(s dhloi= *filo/xoros e)n e(/kth| bu/blw| th=s *)atqi/dos
kata\ le/cin ou(/tw gra/fwn:  e)/peita diecelqw\n
